vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Planned Development District for multifamily uses on property zoned a CR Community Retail District with a D-1 Liquor Control Overlay and an R-10(A) Single Family District, on the east corner of South Belt Line Road and Seagoville Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Denial
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a development plan and conditions with retention of the D-1 Liquor Control Overlay
Z190-215(AU)
